mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT( p.name, '-', b.building_id % 100, '栋', '-', r.room_id % 10000, '房', '-', bed.bed_id % 100, '床' ) AS location FROM bed INNER JOIN room r ON bed.room_id = r.room_id INNER JOIN building b ON r.building_id = b.building_id INNER JOIN park p ON b.park_id = p.park_id WHERE bed.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(user_id) FROM bed WHERE room_id = #{roomId} AND user_id IS NOT NULL

SELECT CONCAT( p.name, '-', b.building_id % 100, '栋', '-', r.room_id % 10000, '房', '-', bed.bed_id % 100, '床' ) AS location FROM bed INNER JOIN room r ON bed.room_id = r.room_id INNER JOIN building b ON r.building_id = b.building_id INNER JOIN park p ON b.park_id = p.park_id WHERE bed.bed_id = #{targetBed}

SELECT p.park_id, b.building_id, r.room_id, bed.bed_id FROM bed INNER JOIN room r ON bed.room_id = r.room_id INNER JOIN building b ON r.building_id = b.building_id INNER JOIN park p ON b.park_id = p.park_id WHERE bed.user_id = #{userId}
select building.dormitory_id from bed inner join room on bed.room_id = room.room_id inner join building on room.building_id = building.building_id where bed.bed_id = #{bedId}
